name: old-amber
effect: Give to a scientist in the mining museum in oreburgh city or the Museum of Science in pewter city to receive a aerodactyl.
short_effect: Can be revived into an Aerodactyl.

flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A stone containing
the genes of an
ancient POKéMON.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A piece of amber that contains
the genes of an ancient POKéMON.
It is clear with a reddish tint.
